name: AstroJump (zoietsoi)
description:
My 3D Platformer game following the CAS 117 tutorials with modifications.

My modifications:

- Design: created one complete level with multiple rooms

- Aesthetic: created my own custom music

- Gameplay: added a new obstacle - puddle of green acid in room 2 (if you fall in you lose a life)

Credits:

Created by Zoie Tsoi
